title: SC summons full court  meeting on Sep 8
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 05 (APP):The Supreme Court has called a full court meeting on the administrative side on September 8.
The full court meeting will be held at 1 pm under the chairmanship of Chief Justice of Pakistan Yahya Afridi.
The meeting will consist of only a single-point agenda. The meeting will review the amendments to the Supreme Court Rules 2025.
The President of the Supreme Court Bar Association has already sent written suggestions to the Supreme Court.
